page.title: 15CONSERVATION SOCIETIES
page.content: Denbigh is surrounded by beautiful and varied countryside.The open countryside is easily accessible by an intricate{public footpath}system.The Ramblers Association and local Civic Society are endeavouring to make sure that the less frequently used rights of way are reopened or kept open for future generations. The Civic Society is also involved with architectural and {natural conservation}in the area.The local council have been made aware of this and pressure brought about by this society. The housing development at Bwa Fflats has been suspended as a result of public pressure.It is hoped by many that future building will take place within existing boundaries and not on randomly chosen land as has seemingly been past practice.
